title: Augmentative and Diminutive in Brazilian Portuguese - Nouns Lesson

media:group.media:title: Augmentative and Diminutive in Brazilian Portuguese - Nouns Lesson
media:group.media:description:
This lesson is about augmentative and diminutive in Brazilian Portuguese. Learn the basic principles and some of the nuances, details and variations of these forms. Learn more about brazilian portuguese nouns and how to use them. 

Chapters
0:00 - Introduction
0:17 - Principles
1:31 - "Diminutivo Sintético"
3:07 - "Aumentativo Sintético"
3:56 - Fond Use
4:34 - Derogatory Use
5:08 - Adjectives and Adverbs
5:59 - Gender, Variations, Meanings
7:51 - Conclusion

The channel has a lot of other lessons about portuguese language. Take a look!

#LearnBrazilianPortuguese
